File upload

Drag and drop file upload using XMLHttpRequest requires support for the draggable method, the FormData XHR method and the FileReader API. These are not supported in IE9, so a fallback solution is needed for this browser.

NOTE: Uploading the chosen file(s) will depend on the component's parent form submission. The actual method for uplaoding the file will depend on the implementation - front/back end, AJAX/legacy (IFRAME?), etc.
